name: Inspection Day (Godot Wild Jam #30)
description:
You're a medical intern, tasked with aiding 5 truly odd patients. Each pair of patients has an increasing number of mini-games you have to complete before advancing to the next set. Careful! Underperform and you may find yourself getting fired!

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #30. The theme is 'Heartbeat' and we went with the wildcard 'Arcade' - by making a game made up of minigames.

The Team
